column1: The Lexington Traffic Management Center will be closed on Monday February 18 for the President's Day holiday.
Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday February 19 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-64W at 53 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: Roadway shutdown due to a multi-vehicle collision at the 51 MM.

column3: I-64W at 53 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: Detour:  Exit 53 to US-127 to US-60.

column3: I-64W at 53 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: UPDATE 4:19 p.m. - The roadway is back open.
Effective Monday 2/18 at 1:25 p.m., the ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
